abstract: Teradici, a start-up that is developing chips to deliver a PC-like experience over a network, said it completed a $17 million Series C round of venture funding.
snippet: Teradici, a start-up that is developing chips to deliver a PC-like experience over a network, said it completed a $17 million Series C round of venture funding.
lead_paragraph: Teradici, a Canadian start-up that is developing chips to deliver a PC-like experience over a network, said it completed a $17 million Series C round of venture funding.
